categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Frances Alfred Basil Tomlin was an actor who played two uncredited roles in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, portraying the character BoShek as well as an unnamed stormtrooper (alongside his brother, George). Tomlin remained unidentified for his roles in A New Hope until February 2016, over 11 years after his death.
